== Operational AEMET-HIRLAM ==

The current AEMET operational NWP system is based on the HIRLAM reference version 7.2

|| Model             || '''ONR''' || '''HNR''' || '''CNN''' || 
|| Gridpoints        || 582x424 || 606x430 || 606x430 ||   
|| Levels            ||      40 ||      40 ||      40 ||  
|| Mesh size (deg.)  ||   0.16 ||   0.05 ||   0.05 ||  
|| ANALYSIS          ||  3DVAR  ||  3DVAR  ||   3DVAR  ||   
|| FGAT              ||     Yes ||     Yes ||    Yes   ||
|| DA cycle          ||     6h  ||      6h ||      6h || 
|| VARan increments  ||     2x  ||      2x ||     2x   || 
|| Host model        ||   ECMWF ||  ECMWF  ||    ECMWF || 
|| Boundary age (FC) ||      6h ||      6h ||      6h ||
|| Boundary interval ||      3h ||      3h ||      3h ||   
|| Forecast length   ||     72h ||     36h ||  36h || 
|| Forecasts per day ||       4 ||       4 ||     4 ||
|| Timestep          ||    600s ||    240s ||    240s ||
|| Cond. scheme      ||  KF || KF  ||     KF  ||
